attributes.action: Stop the UK Government invoking Article 50 without a House of Commons vote
attributes.background: The decision to leave the EU is so significant it requires the consent of MPs in a Commons vote. We the undersigned call on the Prime Minister to ensure this vote takes place and to only start the process of leaving the EU if a majority of MPs agree in a vote following a full House of Commons debate

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
